config_name.description: TODO

hw_name.description: This is the VESC BMS. Some hw-specific info will be added here.

controller_id.description: BMS ID. Used to identify this VESC BMS on the CAN-bus.

send_can_status_rate_hz.description: Send status messages on the CAN-bus at this rate.

can_baud_rate.description: CAN-bus baud rate.

balance_mode.description:
Cell Balancing Mode. Options:


BALANCE_MODE_DISABLED

Do not balance cells at all.


BALANCE_MODE_CHARGING_ONLY

Only balance while charging.


BALANCE_MODE_DURING_AND_AFTER_CHARGING

Balance cells during charging and after charging has finished. Balancing will stop as soon as the balance_max_current is exceeded.


BALANCE_MODE_ALWAYS

Always allow balancing.

cell_num.description: Number of cells in series.

cell_first_index.description: Channel of the first cell.

max_bal_ch.description: Maximum number of simultaneous balancing channels.

dist_bal.description: Enables distributed balancing between BMSes on the CAN-bus.

vc_balance_start.description: Start balancing if cell voltage is this much above the minimum cell voltage.

vc_balance_end.description: Stop balancing when cell voltage is this much above the minimum cell voltage.

vc_charge_start.description: Start charging when the maximum cell voltage is below this voltage.

vc_charge_end.description: End charging when the maximum cell voltage is above this voltage.

vc_charge_min.description: Only allow charging if all cells are above this voltage.

vc_balance_min.description: Only allow balancing if all cells are above this voltage.

balance_max_current.description: Only allow balancing when the current magnitude is below this value.

min_current_ah_wh_cnt.description: The current must be above this magnitude for the Ah and Wh couters to run.

min_current_sleep.description: Enter sleep mode when the current magnitude is below this value.

v_charge_detect.description: Start charging when the voltage at the charge port is above this voltage.

t_charge_max.description: Disable charging when the cell temperature is above this value.

i_measure_mode.description:
Current measurement mode. Some BMS versions have optional current measurement, and can instead use the current reported by the VESCs on the CAN-bus.


BMS

Use BMS current sensor. Might need configuration on hardware with an external PCB.


VESC CAN

Use sum of currents reported by VESCs on the CAN-bus.

ext_shunt_res.description: Current Shunt Resistance.

ext_shunt_gain.description: Current shunt amplifier gain.

ext_pch_r_top.description: Precharge output top resistor value.

ext_pch_r_bot.description: Precharge output bottom resistor value.

max_charge_current.description: Maximum allowed charge current.

sleep_timeout_reset_ms.description:
Go to sleep if no keep-awake event has occurred for longer time than this. Examples of keep-awake events are:


  • Balancing is active
  • Values are polled over CAN or USB
  • USB cable plugged in
  • Charging is active
  • Other BMSes on the CAN-bus are charging or balancing
  • VESC status messages are received
  • Current over min_current_sleep is drawn

soc_filter_const.description: State of Charge filter constant. Range 0.1 to 1 000 000. Lower values give more filtering. 1 000 000 disables filtering.

t_bal_lim_start.description: Start limiting the number of balancing channels at this temperature.

t_bal_lim_end.description: Disable all balancing channels above this temperature.

t_charge_min.description: Disable charging when the cell temperature is below this value.

t_charge_mon_en.description: Enable temperature monitoring during charging. This can be disabled to allow charging when a temperature sensor is broken or missing.
